## otto login

Add an API key to your configuration

### Synopsis

Add an API key to your configuration. 
This API key will be used to authenticate with the OpenAI ChatGPT API.

```
otto login [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -k, --apikey string   API key to add to configuration
  -h, --help            help for login
```
